title: Medical warnings on product labels
context: Read a warning about side effects or dangers on a label.

content.bestLine: Read the label carefully for side effects

neutral.text: Be aware of potential side effects
Take as directed to avoid risks
Consult a doctor if you have concerns
Read the fine print for important information
Heed the warnings to ensure safety

formal.text: It is essential to read the label carefully
Adhere to the instructions to minimize risks
Consult a medical professional if necessary

patterns.template: If you experience [options], seek medical attention
To avoid [options], take the medication as directed
patterns.meaning: Instruction to follow the dosage instructions

dialogs.description: Pharmacist warning a patient about side effects

lines.speaker: Pharmacist
lines.text: Please read the label carefully for any warnings

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Okay, what are the most common side effects?

dialogs.description: Doctor instructing a patient on medication use

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Take the medication as directed to minimize risks

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: What should I do if I experience any side effects?
